Mont Saint Michel

On one of the rainy days we were staying in Saint Malo, we took a trip to Mont Saint Michel. I remember taking a school trip there about 20 years ago but it was great to go back because I didn't remember much. What an amazing place. Too bad it was raining but we still had a blast. Highly recommended.
